Room.Name: Nathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the southwest corner of the village.
Room.LongDescription: You are also just south of a string of expensive little shops, where you can buy most anything if you have the gold. Directly north of you is a jewelry shop. Next door is a shop which is known to specialize in footwear for all races. The shop belongs to a very old hobbitish shoemaker.
